content: This article **needs additional citations for verification**. Please help improve this article by adding citations to reliable sources. Unsourced material may be challenged and removed. *Find sources:* "Everton Park, Singapore" – news **·** newspapers **·** books **·** scholar **·** JSTOR *(July 2018)* *(Learn how and when to remove this message)*Subzone of Bukit Merah Planning Area in Central Region, Singapore **Everton Park** ([Chinese](/wiki/Chinese_language): 艾弗顿园) is a subzone within the planning area of [Bukit Merah](/wiki/Bukit_Merah), [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore), as defined by the [Urban Redevelopment Authority](/wiki/Urban_Redevelopment_Authority) (URA). Its boundary is made up of [New Bridge Road](/wiki/New_Bridge_Road) and [Eu Tong Sen Street](/wiki/Eu_Tong_Sen_Street) in the north; Kampong Bahru Road in the west; the [Ayer Rajah Expressway](/wiki/Ayer_Rajah_Expressway) (AYE) in the south; and [Cantonment Road](/wiki/Cantonment_Road,_Singapore) in the east. Everton Park also refers to a minor road within the subzone. The subzone took its name from this road. This [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore) location article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Everton Park, Singapore
